The risk ionize radiation-related cancer , leukemia , lung cancer , thyroid cancer , among flight attendant also evaluate . The result study apply female flight crew frequent flier .
DOC.brief_title: The Incidence Breast Other Cancers Among Female Flight Attendants
DOC.detailed_description: Flight attendant may increase risk breast cancer due work-place exposure include cosmic radiation circadian rhythm disruption travel across multiple time zone . This cancer incidence study determine whether female flight attendant increase risk breast cancer whether risk dose-related . The study include cohort approximately 9,631 woman employ flight attendant one year . Breast cancer case identify telephone interview live subject next-of-kin deceased subject , well death certificate . The interview also provide information non-occupational risk factor breast cancer parity . Both internal external comparison make . The primary analysis evaluate risk associate occupational exposure within cohort , control non-occupational risk factor stratification model . The secondary analysis compare incidence breast cancer cohort general population , adjustment factor low parity might increase breast cancer risk cohort independent occupational exposure cosmic radiation circadian rhythm disruption . The risk ionize radiation-related cancer , leukemia , lung cancer , thyroid cancer , among flight attendant also evaluate . The result study apply female flight crew frequent flier .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Employed flight attendant one year Pan AM Pan Am cease operation 1991 . For flight attendant transfer Pan Am National Airlines Pan Am buy National Airlines 1981 , time employed flight attendant National Airlines count towards one year minimum . A U.S. citizen begin work Pan Am ( National Airlines , flight attendant transfer Pan AM National Airlines ) . Worked least one day January 1 , 1953 .
